entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] OnAppearing only called on 1st tab of AppShell home page #9531
  • Maui showing this when building #9528
  • UpdateSourceEventName doesn't work #9527
    Backlog
  • ResourceDictionary loaded from rd.xaml does not expose any entries #9526
    .NET 7
  • [Windows] Scrolled event is triggered with some delays when scrolling using mouse pad #9524
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI - CollectionView SelectedItem binding functions on Windows but not Android platform #9523
    Backlog
  • [MAC/iOS] Enabling RightToLeft for scroll view at the run time is not working #9518
    Backlog
  • Why Entry and Button that are covered by other layout can still get the focus. #9514
  • TabbedPage for Android with child navigation shows the Tabbar #9512
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • Java.Lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: 'setSpan ( ... ) ends beyond length #9418
    Backlog
  • Review the performance implications of using a Concurrent Dictionary inside WrappedServiceProvider #8128
    .NET 7
  • MAUI Flyout page leaves visual artefact on Android when changing pages #9495
  • .NET MAUI installation bug: The target platform identifier android/ios/maccatalyst was not recognized #9498
  • Why does System.IO.Directory.Exists return false when viewing Mac path in .net Maui? #9494
  • On Windows some controls won't show image icons #9502
  • Cannot Upload MAUI Archive to Apple App Store #9507
  • Android MauiWebView Layout issue #9517
  • .Net Maui Preferences.Get Returns Null instead of defaultValue on Windows Machine #9499
  • Global resources when using linked ResourceDictionaries - not able to use from code behind #9513
  • Picker ItemSource not working on Windows #9516
  • Messed up Appearing/Disappearing events in Maui Pages #9497
  • When developing maui apps ,application toolbar missing. #9501
  • Unable to activate Windows Store app - The parameter is incorrect #9500
  • Create and Publish android APK for .NET MAUI Blazor #9511
  • Android: When opening the app by clicking on a push notification, Application.OnResume is not called. #9290
  • Running various Samples in .NET MAUI source code. #9283

PullRequests

Created

  • Wire up scene life cycle events #9525
  • Moves Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Gtk into the Maui repo #9522
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix default corner radius on Button #9515
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button

Merged

  • Pin SDK to stable 6.0.400 #9532
  • Make sure cursor doesn't go out of bounds when setting Entry/Editor text #9521
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr5

Updated

  • Enable Window Sizing #4942
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, 7.0-rc1
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
  • Propagate semantic properties from FlyoutItem #9270
  • Update Package.appxmanifest to have PhonePublisherId #9477
    partner/winui, do-not-merge, community ✨
  • Context menu support for Windows and MacCatalyst #9174
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Implement SkiaImage Save #9125
    area/drawing ✏️, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • Tooltip Text support for Views #8864
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, .NET 7
  • Update SkiaSharp to the new stable #9509
    area/single project ☝️, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0-sr5
